hero.mainText2: I'm a creative mind ready to build

about.title: About Me
about.name: Ahsan Imam Khan
about.p1: Passionate developer crafting digital experiences with precision and creativity
about.p2: I am a B.Tech Computer Science student at MIT-WPU. I am passionate about coding, exploring new technologies, and turning ideas into real-world applications.
about.p3: I love collaborating on projects that challenge me to grow and innovate. When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies and continuously improving my skills.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: I build full-stack websites and web applications with a focus on performance and search engine optimization (SEO).

skills.title: My Skills
skills.subtitle: A showcase of my technical abilities and tools I use.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: These are some of my recent projects. Check out my GitHub for more. Tap any card to see more details.

certificates.title: My Certificates
certificates.subtitle: A showcase of my professional certifications and qualifications. Tap to learn more.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? Let's talk. I am here to help you.
